trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Controla como o documento é impresso, durante a impressão por meio de um aplicativo do Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> controles como um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> é impresso.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> invoca o controlador impressão <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> métodos, que por sua vez indicam a impressora como imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Visualização de impressão usa um especializado <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um controlador de impressão é especializado para visualização de impressão, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> é usado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>e normalmente não são usadas diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework inclui três controladores de impressão que são derivados de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> que ajudam a realizar tarefas comuns.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> imprime um documento para uma impressora.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> gera uma visualização de documento aparência quando impresso e é usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> fornece uma caixa de diálogo status impressão durante o processo de impressão.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir com formulários do Windows, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser imprimir a partir de um aplicativo do Windows Presentation Foundation, consulte o <xref:System.Printing> namespace.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" />.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir segura em uma caixa de diálogo restrita.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> é usado para visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir uma página de um documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se uma exceção é gerada dentro de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> não for chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método para definir como imprimir uma página em um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode ajustar as configurações de página separadamente para cada página.) O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> método para determinar quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode programar a impressão para 30 minutos ou ajustar as configurações de impressora para o documento.) O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, começa a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir uma página de um documento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que representa uma página de um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método para definir como imprimir uma página em um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode ajustar as configurações de página separadamente para cada página.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> método para determinar quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode programar a impressão para 30 minutos ou ajustar as configurações de impressora para o documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é enviado para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para um de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> método é um bom lugar para verificar se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> são válidos.
